title: High Fertilizer Usage
description: In 2022, New Zealand's fertilizer consumption reached 1633.43 kilograms per hectare of arable land, one of the highest in the world.

title: Negative Interest Rate Spread
description: In 2018, New Zealand had a negative interest rate spread of -3.26%, indicating a unique financial environment.

title: Exemplary Public Services for Labor
description: In 2024, New Zealand scored a perfect 100 in the adequacy of public services for labor, showcasing its commitment to workforce welfare.

title: Efficient Taxation System
description: With an overall score of 71.74 in 2024, New Zealand's taxation system is recognized for its efficiency and quality regulations.

title: Minimal Tax Official Meetings
description: In 2023, businesses in New Zealand required an average of just one meeting with tax officials, reflecting streamlined processes.

title: Stable Political Environment
description: In 2023, New Zealand had nine sources confirming its political stability and a low standard error of 0.205, indicating a peaceful nation.

title: Low Tariff Lines with International Peaks
description: In 2022, only 0.017% of New Zealand's tariff lines for all products had international peaks, promoting trade openness.

title: Low Tariff Lines for Primary Products
description: In 2022, New Zealand had just 0.128% of its tariff lines for primary products with international peaks, supporting agricultural trade.
